name: CrowdStrike
description:
This plugin fetches hosts and their respective ZTA scores from the Host Setup and Management > Host Management page on the CrowdStrike tenant. It also supports 'Add/Remove Tag(s)' for device tagging and 'Put RTR Script' action on hosts.

 Netskope normalization score calculation => CrowdStrike host assessment overall score * 10.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of CrowdStrike instance. e.g. https://api.crowdstrike.com

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID generated from the CrowdStrike platform. Client ID can be generated from the 'Support and resources > API clients and keys' page.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret generated from the CrowdStrike platform. Client Secret can be generated from the 'Support and resources > API clients and keys' page.

configuration.label: Maximum Score
configuration.description: Only the host(s) with score less than or equal to the Maximum Score will be tracked. Value should be an integer in range of 1 to 100.
